entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:56 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:56 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
